title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4821.3 - Additional license fee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4821.3 - Additional license fee

State Regulations

Upon the filing of the financial statement of bingo
operations, the licensee shall pay to the clerk of the municipality as an
additional license fee a sum in the amount of three percent of the reported net
proceeds, if any, for the occasion covered by such statement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4821.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
